# My Dotfiles

This directory contains .dot files for my development environment.

- neovim
- .zshrc

## Requirements

### Git

### Stow

```
sudo apt stow
```

## Installation

```
git clone git@github.com:xcarolan/.dotfiles.git
cd .dotfiles
stow .
```

[you tube](Vlhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y6XCebnB9gs)
